Package ohos.sysappcomponents.settings

Class SystemSettings.Wireless

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.sysappcomponents.settings.SystemSettings.Wireless
  • Enclosing class:
    SystemSettings

    public static class SystemSettings.Wireless
extends Object
    Provides methods for setting radio network information, including information about Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Near Field Communication (NFC), and the airplane mode.
    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      static String AIRPLANE_MODE_RADIOS

      Specifies whether the device can be discovered or connected by other devices through Bluetooth.

      Specifies whether Bluetooth is enabled.

      static String WIFI_STATUS
      Specifies whether Wi-Fi is enabled.
      static String WIFI_TO_MOBILE_DATA_AWAKE_TIMEOUT
      Indicates the maximum duration to hold a wake lock when waiting for the mobile data connection to establish after the Wi-Fi connection is disconnected.
      static String WIFI_WATCHDOG_STATUS
      Specifies whether Wi-Fi watchdog is enabled.

    • Field Detail

      • AIRPLANE_MODE_RADIOS

        public static final String AIRPLANE_MODE_RADIOS
        Indicates the list of radio signals to be disabled when airplane mode is enabled. Multiple radio signals are separated by commas (,).
        • BLUETOOTH_RADIO - Bluetooth is disabled in airplane mode.
        • CELL_RADIO - Cellular radio is disabled in airplane mode.
        • NFC_RADIO - NFC is disabled in airplane mode.
        • WIFI_RADIO - Wi-Fi is disabled in airplane mode.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BLUETOOTH_DISCOVERABILITY_STATUS

        public static final String BLUETOOTH_DISCOVERABILITY_STATUS
        Specifies whether the device can be discovered or connected by other devices through Bluetooth. If the value is 0, the device cannot be connected or discovered. If the value is 1, the device can be connected but cannot be discovered. If the value is 2, the device can be connected and discovered.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BLUETOOTH_DISCOVER_TIMEOUT

        public static final String BLUETOOTH_DISCOVER_TIMEOUT
        Indicates the duration (in seconds) that the device can be discovered through Bluetooth.

        After the duration expires, the device cannot be discovered through Bluetooth.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BLUETOOTH_RADIO

        public static final String BLUETOOTH_RADIO
        A constant of AIRPLANE_MODE_RADIOS to indicate that Bluetooth is disabled in airplane mode.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BLUETOOTH_STATUS

        public static final String BLUETOOTH_STATUS
        Specifies whether Bluetooth is enabled.

        If the value is true, Bluetooth is enabled. If the value is false, Bluetooth is disabled.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CELL_RADIO

        public static final String CELL_RADIO
        A constant of AIRPLANE_MODE_RADIOS to indicate that cellular radio is disabled in airplane mode.
        Since:

        Constant Field Values

      • OWNER_LOCKDOWN_WIFI_CFG

        public static final String OWNER_LOCKDOWN_WIFI_CFG
        Specifies whether the Wi-Fi configuration created by the application of the device owner should be locked down.

        If the value is true, the Wi-Fi configuration should be locked down. If the value is false, the Wi-Fi configuration should not be locked down.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • WIFI_DHCP_MAX_RETRY_COUNT

        public static final String WIFI_DHCP_MAX_RETRY_COUNT

        Since:

        See Also:

        public static final String WIFI_STATUS

      • WIFI_TO_MOBILE_DATA_AWAKE_TIMEOUT

        public static final String WIFI_TO_MOBILE_DATA_AWAKE_TIMEOUT

        public static final String WIFI_WATCHDOG_STATUS
        Specifies whether Wi-Fi watchdog is enabled.

        If the value is true, Wi-Fi watchdog is enabled. If the value is false, Wi-Fi watchdog is disabled.

        Since:

    • Method Detail

      • enableAirplaneMode

        public static boolean enableAirplaneMode​(Context context,
                                         boolean enable)
        Enables or disables airplane mode.

        After airplane mode is set, the common event CommonEventSupport.COMMON_EVENT_AIRPLANE_MODE_CHANGED is published.

        Permissions: SystemPermission.MANAGE_SECURE_SETTINGS

        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context.
        enable - Specifies whether to enable airplane mode. The value true means to enable airplane mode, and false means to disable airplane mode.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the operation is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3
